评论详情: Bought this for my granddaughter. The design is exactly what she wanted but the shirt is very cheaply made. No finished hem. It is only served on the edges.
My 12 year old loves it. Super cute. Not quite a crop top, which this parent approves.
I love this shirt! From the minute I put it on, I did not wanna take it off. It fits beautifully and looks even better!
I love how comfortable the fabric is! I love the design, it fits perfectly. I’ve had it for over 3 months and there is no damage to it ex. The design hasn’t faded yet.
TTS and is really cute on. My daughter loves the cut and style. She has worn it several times and the quality and durability has been great with washing. No shrinking and super soft.
doesn't look bad on a plus size body or chubby. Its really comfy
This shirt is super cute and it's comfy, my only problem is it's not super baggy! :)
